title: 1.8为什么找不到endermen呢
author: wjfmmyjj
txt_content: 刚刚下了个1.8版本  结果到了晚上 到处都是僵尸蜘蛛 没有看到新怪物 endermen呢   这玩意儿在哪里刷啊？？

replies.author: vintene
replies.txt_content:
请在此确定你的版本是不是1.8.1
要真的是的话，就是人品了，人品很重要的！

replies.txt_content:

rp啊。。。你指望他来找你

replies.author: vintene
replies.txt_content:
wjfmmyjj 发表于 2011-9-25 19:00 
到了白天会像僵尸那样死掉吗？？
The Enderman is a mob that was introduced in version 1.8; The Adventure Update.[1][2] The Endermen are 3 block high,[3] black creatures with long arms and legs, glowing purple eyes and a purple particle effect similar to a Portal. They are rare in comparison to other mobs (with the exception of the spawner-only Cave Spider), but can still be seen regularly at night on the Overworld in groups of up to five. Their two iconic abilities are the ability to pick up and move blocks and teleportation. Endermen take damage from coming in contact with water (including water blocks and rain)[4] and sunlight. Their exact size is 0.6x0.6x2.9. 

这是我从官网上copy下来的。看倒数第二句： Endermen take damage from coming in contact with water (including water blocks and rain)[4] and sunlight. 
e基会受到水和阳光的伤害！
